subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Ted Ligety of the United States put together two nearly flawless runs in difficult conditions to win a World Cup giant slalom Sunday in St. Moritz, Switzerland.
snippet: Ted Ligety of the United States put together two nearly flawless runs in difficult conditions to win a World Cup giant slalom Sunday in St. Moritz, Switzerland.
